duties_responsibilities.duty: Learn internal Grant Research and Writing procedures.
Research and summarize federal, state, and local grants, public policy, regulations, practices, and programs.
Evaluate new grant opportunities based on broad client needs and prepare summaries of grant program requirements.
Assist in preparing application content such as work plans, narratives, budgets, and letters of support.
Perform clerical work including data entry and collection.
Assist with quality control and copy editing on application content.
Participate in client meetings and attend various events that include local elected officials and government professionals.
Prepare monthly status report materials for clients.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Public Policy, Public Administration, or a related field (Master's preferred)
